section.title: Summary
section.value:
HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript cross-browser and cross-platform semantic markup.
Experience on JavaScript/AJAX development with frameworks: Google Closure JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS, node.js, backbone.
Familiar with implementation methods of interfaces with responsive/adaptive layout.
Participated to projects with Agile/SCRUM process organization.
Participated in the trips and negotiated with the client during the project requirements analysis.
Team leadership and department management experience, high analytical, communicative and mentoring skills.

on support and improve PHP-based service that oriented to small typographies.

on markup service.

Support unified repository of knowledge base in actual state. Training of HTML-developers according to curriculum program developed in company. The selection of candidates for training, including qualification testing and interviews.
